text: aur teesara phaayada ye hai taaki tum hidaayat pao musalamaanon ye ehasaan bhee vaisa hee hai jaise ham ne tum mein tum hee mein ka ek rasool bheja jo tumako hamaaree aayaten padh kar sunae aur tumhaare naphs ko paakeeza kare aur tumhen kitaab quraan aur akl kee baaten sikhae aur tum ko vah baaten bataane jin kee tumhen pahale se khabar bhee na thee
